meanings.definition: Relating to the eyebrow or the region of the eyebrow.
meanings.sent1: Her superciliary arches were beautifully shaped.
meanings.sent2: She applied makeup to enhance her superciliary features.
meanings.sent3: The superciliary hairs seemed to dance in the wind.
meanings.sent4: His superciliary expression revealed his true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The superciliary area above her eyes was smooth and defined.

meanings.sent1: The superciliary attitude of the rich man was off-putting.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand his superciliary behavior towards others.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave a superciliary look to the dog, asserting dominance.
meanings.sent4: His superciliary tone made it clear he thought he was better than everyone else.
meanings.sent5: The superciliary smirk on his face showed his arrogance.
